server.dao

Interface IGameDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLGameDAO, XMLGameDAO

    public interface IGameDAO
    Interface for the GameDAO both the SQLUserDao and the XMLUserDAO inherit from this interface
    Author:
    Brennen
